## Microbiome analyses of blood and tissues

This repo contains a scripts which run some analyses on some
of the data reported in Poore et al. (2020) [@Poore:2020aa]
(https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-020-2095-1)
Some data are available from the publisher's web site,
as well as at  ftp://ftp.microbio.me/pub/cancer_microbiome_analysis/.
Programming scripts can be found in a github repo -
 https://github.com/biocore/tcga.
